triage_summary.root_cause: No logging infrastructure exists in storage.py - logging module not imported
risk_points: Logging performance impact on hot paths
Concurrent write debugging needs to capture temp file paths
Cross-cutting concern requiring changes to both storage.py and cli.py
implementation_targets: Add logging import and module-level logger to storage.py
Add debug logs to load(), save(), next_id() methods
Configure logger to only output when debug mode is enabled

changes_summary: Added logging import and module-level logger to storage.py
Added DEBUG logs to load() method with file path and todo count
Added DEBUG logs to save() method with file path, temp file path, and todo count
Added DEBUG logs to next_id() method with computed ID
Added --debug flag to CLI argument parser
Added FLYWHEEL_DEBUG environment variable support in run_command()
Added comprehensive test coverage for debug logging feature
commands_run: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/storage.py src/flywheel/cli.py tests/test_issue_2493_debug_logging.py
